struct  AccessMode
 Access modeMode of access to shared data. Using binary representation [bit3 | bit2 | bit1 | bit0], bit1 is set iff mode is a concurrent mode (r or cw) bit3 is set iff mode is a postponed, other bits are used for identification. More...

class  Thread
 Flow of control with data flow graph representationThe DFG threads inherits from the the RFO threads the structure of stack of frames of closures to implement the reference order of execution of closures. Once a DFG thread is started, it execute all its closures with respect to this order. If a closure is in state WAITING (for a non data flow constraint), the thread is suspended as a RFO thread. More...
class  GlobalDataAttribut
 Type of attribut for a versionThis type allows to code attribut for a global data on an 32 bits unsigned integer. The following bits are reserved:

  • _attr & 0x1 == 1 iff the global data is in a stack, else it is in heap
  • _attr & 0x2 == 1 iff the data is sticky and could not be moved, neither destroyed or copied.
More...
